t: Reset Alexa Smart Light Bulbs if Unresponsive - Amazon Customer Service
s: If your Alexa smart light bulbs are unresponsive, perform a reset. This will work for most smart light bulbs, such as Philips Hue, Sengled, TP-link, LIFX, and Wyze.

t: Alexa Lights Not Responding: Expert Solutions to Fix Unresponsive Lights
s: Here are some troubleshooting steps you can try: Check Power and Connections: Ensure that the lights are plugged in and powered on. If they are smart lights, verify that they are connected to the Wi-Fi network and that your Wi-Fi router is working correctly.

t: Alexa Isn't Controlling Smart Home Devices - Amazon Customer Service
s: Make sure that your smart home device is compatible with Alexa. Devices that have a "Works with Alexa" badge are certified to work with Alexa.
